title: The Lion King
short_plot_summary: Young lion Simba must embrace his role as the rightful king of the Pride Lands after the murder of his father.
explanation: A lion, representing Simba, the main character of the story
A crown, symbolizing Simba's status as the future king of the Pride Lands
A sunrise, indicating the iconic scene when Simba is introduced to the Pride Lands by his father Mufasa
A wild boar, representing Pumbaa, one of Simba's loyal friends who helps him on his journey
A counterclockwise arrows, signifying the Circle of Life theme in the movie
